title: Tommy Pope: Blue Collar Trash
description:
Comedian and podcaster Tommy Pope joins us for our first episode in the studio! Tommy talks being Irish Italian trash from Pennsylvania, above ground pools, and sleeping with his brother. 




You know Tommy Pope from Delco Proper and Comedy Central




Join GAS Digital at www.GasDigitalNetwork.com - use promo code AYG for a discount!




Follow Kevin: https://www.instagram.com/kevinryancomedy/

Follow Foley: https://www.instagram.com/foleygrams/




Comedians H. Foley and Kevin Ryan are self proclaimed GARBAGE. Each week a new stand up comedian gets put to the test.




Steal shampoo from hotels?

Own a George Forman Grill?

Ever worn JNCO Jeans?
